about_the_game:
After a travel, King Grimsam was struck by a terrible illness, leaving his two children, Princess Lianka and Prince Sephan, heirs to the throne of Sephadel, orphaned and the throne empty.

On the other side of the Storm Sea, an unknown plague decimated a village in a matter of days, leaving piles of bodies scattered throughout.

Not far away, there are reports of violent attacks against travelers and unsuspecting people on the roads of the province of Tinegard.

You are Baldric Lamarc, a former soldier from a prestigious family in the kingdom, who has been tasked by your family to attend the funeral of the late king as a show of mourning.



But a terrible and mysterious tragedy will forever change your life, as you try to uncover the causes and culprits behind the recent events while attempting to maintain your life and freedom.

Explore the province of Tinegard, part of the kingdom of Sephadel, in search of answers that could absolve you of all the blame that has fallen upon you after these terrible tragedies.

LET THE ADVENTURE BEGIN!



Embark on a quest for redemption, truth, and freedom on a continent filled with challenges to overcome. Engage in main and side missions that will provide you with various unique and powerful equipment and abilities.

Take part in various activities such as fishing, mining, or farming, which will provide useful items for both yourself and the people of Tinegard through the various missions that require these items.

Arm yourself, purchase supplies, and prepare for intense real-time combat in all areas outside the cities, facing a wide range of dangerous enemies who will stop at nothing to prevent you from completing your objectives.



LET THE ADVENTURE BEGIN!

WHAT WILL YOU FIND IN ENVYUS?

  • While exploring the game world, engage in various activities such as fishing, farming, mining, for personal consumption, sale, production of new items, or in main or side missions.

  • Weapons, armor, and abilities aren't simply bought or acquired through leveling up. Obtain new equipment or abilities solely through missions, whether main or side.

  • Initially, not all areas of the game world are available, but as you progress, the player gains access to all villages, cities, forests, ruins, and other areas of the game.

  • During missions, the player will encounter various puzzles that require the player's attention, dexterity, and quick thinking to solve them.

  • Complete all missions, always evading detection by the royal guard, seeking answers to the events that led you to that place, which could either exonerate you or lead you to complete ruin.​
